fields.title: SpringBoot + Kotlin is coming to ZenWaveSDK

frontmatter.title: SpringBoot + Kotlin is coming to ZenWaveSDK
frontmatter.author: Ivan Garcia Sainz-Aja
frontmatter.excerpt: With ZenWaveSDK v2.1.0 soon, you’ll be able to generate Spring Boot backend applications in either Java or Kotlin, with full customization to adapt to your team’s internal libraries or custom annotations.
